update.description: v1.5.2 * Save AWS credentials login v1.5.1 * Add AWS credentials login v1.5.0 * Cosmetic negative size v1.4.9 * Fix multi-fragments delete v1.4.8 * Add support for multi-fragments movies v1.4.7 * Flex 4.1 v1.4.6 * AppleTV/HDTV v1.4.5 * Better filename handling. v1.4.4 * Fix total size. * Fix Browse v1.4.3 * Better progress status/report. v1.4.2 * More fixes. v1.4.1 * Fix out of memory problem. * Add Browse (s3browse.com) v1.3.1 * Add remove button v1.3 * Cache thumbnails and description in the app storage. * Fixes v1.2 * Fix the download queue length v1.1 * Bug fixing
